title: General "switch" description in help message - update for "--" indicator
body:
This pull request updates the general "switch" description in the help message.
This can be considered as a follow-up of #5786 delivery, where double-dash switch indicator has been added.

---

The changes contain:
* Help message update: added third indicator's option and removed "*both*" as it's now invalid
* Applied changes to the localizations

commit.message:
Update HelpMessage_3_SwitchesHeader description

After adding support for both "--" and "-" switch indicators, the help
message became outdated. It still mentiones only "-" and "/" indicators,
which can be confusing.
This commit fixes it by updating the description of the main text.
Apply help message change to localizations
